website_summaries.verdict: Razer's 2019 Blade Stealth ultraportable, a smart refinement of its excellent predecessor, packs a sharp (and sharp-edged) redesign, a new dedicated graphics option, and snappy performance with a strong supporting feature set.
cons: Models configured with Nvidia graphics can get pricey

customer_reviews.title: Speakers defective.
customer_reviews.text: Paying £1,499 just to downgrade speakers and loosing dolby atmos quality? I don't think so. The speakers made a crackling noise and by fixing this you would need to install the old driver resulting in the loss of dolby atmos quality like are you serious? The quality sounds awful.
customer_reviews.author: Bilal

customer_reviews.title: Some serious issues with this model
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, the early modules have a number of issues. Battery discharging when plugged in, crackel from the speakers and excessive coile whine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very good computer system, fast operating, long battery life. My son uses it for school A levels and will serve him into University.
customer_reviews.author: John Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Just buy one
customer_reviews.text: Very glad I purchased this model , for what I need the battery life is good , I don’t play games though, screen is excellent, very fast especially after my tweaks , very sturdy build quality, keyboard action is also good , glad I purchased this over the dell XP’s ,
customer_reviews.author: paul gray

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine, mackook level quality,Finger print magnet
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it along with an EGPU to run my oculus rift s. beautiful design. be aware though you can't upgrade the RAM on the 13Inch version (or at least I haven't found a way?). although 16GB in enough for most and to be fair is enough for me to to do VR gaming. Currently upgrading the SSD (really easy) to a 1TB only £99 on amazon so not bad. I came from a MacBook Pro 2016 to this for gaming and VR. Love it now wouldn't go back to a Mac laptop
customer_reviews.author: MR T O'SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Overall for simple productivity this device is great, but the screens brightness and the laptops lacking gaming potential makes it a MacBook Air competitor at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coil/Fan Whine unbearable
customer_reviews.text: Just when you pug the charger in when it is on the fans seem to be gettin ready for take off. THought it was resolvable through updates....nope. Not sure how razer support would help as they have been unhelpfull in the past...... Just trying to work on a few documents and the headaches started again..........not sure this was worth it............
customer_reviews.author: Demonjack

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price, but there are better.
customer_reviews.text: The panel on this laptop has very bad response times considering it is marketed as a gaming laptop, very bad ghosting along with some problems with the fans going crazy from time to time when plugging in. The laptop operates very smoothly and performs better than what you expect for the components that are inside.
customer_reviews.author: Filip Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: High spec, high price, strange keyboard layout
customer_reviews.text: Well made and a good spec, not cheap but if you like windows machines might be worth it. The arrow keys are in a very odd place so when you think you are pressing the shift you are pressing down arrow!
customer_reviews.author: M J W

customer_reviews.title: Good build, strange keyboard, bad webcam
customer_reviews.text: The screen is really nice and colour accurate. The speaker can get loud which is good however it makes popping noise from time to time. The integrated webcam is kinda bad, doesn’t really catch green. I personally find it hard to get use to the keyboard design as well. Kinda expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for it's size. Build quality is very good, the matte black finish is beautiful, although it is a fingerpint magnent. The laptop performs very well for what I need it to perform, coding, text-editors. For the price, I would say this laptop was a very good deal, and so far I've had no issues related to coil whining, or the speakers. Soild purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Raad

customer_reviews.title: Performance, light weight, quality build...
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected... Great build quality and the best screen I have seen on a laptop... Great battery life, extremely thin and when coupled with a Razer Core X a great gaming machine...
customer_reviews.author: Grungni

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not buy this laptop. Awful product and when I tried to get the issues fixed, Razor offered little to no useful assisstance.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The most powerful and portable laptop
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd like a touchscreen laptop but these are great. It comes quite heavily configured for 'gaming' use, but I use it for work and once all the razer gaming stuff was toned down, I can get a good 5 hours of battery life. I've had no issues with the charger falling out as some other reviews have said. Overall the laptop is un matched when it comes to portable power and battery life. Take Dell xps's for example that don't have a gpu in any of the 13" versions, or a MacBook that is just an expensive tin with a hamster inside.
customer_reviews.author: PTester

customer_reviews.title: I EXPECT BETTER
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. No performance compared to whats promised. So many issues, with the display, speakers, thermals, ports and overall performance. After reading so many good things about these laptops, this is an embarrassment to the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Gerken

customer_reviews.title: Amazing laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is the best laptop I have ever used. It is extremely fast, works very well and has an amazing screen. I've had my laptop for a few months now and it's still amazing. Battery life is not amazing though.
customer_reviews.author: JP
